quote: You’ll miss the best things if you keep your eyes shut.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Being crazy isn’t enough.
author: Unknown

quote: They say I’m old-fashioned, and live in the past, but sometimes I think progress progresses too fast!
author: Unknown

quote: Oh the things you can find, if you don’t stay behind!
author: Unknown

quote: In the places I go there are things that I see that I never could spell if I stopped with the Z.
author: Unknown

quote: How did it get so late so soon? Its night before its afternoon. December is here before its June. My goodness how the time has flewn. How did it get so late so soon?
author: Unknown

quote: Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it’s a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Simple it’s not, I am afraid you will find, for a mind-maker-upper to make up his mind.
author: Unknown

quote: I know, up on top you are seeing great sights, but down here at the bottom we, too, should have rights.
author: Unknown

quote: Today I shall behave, as if this is the day I will be remembered.
author: Unknown

quote: I meant what I said and I said what I meant.
author: Unknown

quote: In my world, everyone’s a pony and they all eat rainbows and poop butterflies!
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment, until it becomes a memory.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I’m telling you this ‘cause you’re one of my friends. My alphabet starts where your alphabet ends!
author: Unknown

quote: Think and wonder, wonder and think.
author: Unknown

quote: So be sure when you step, step with care and great tact. And remember that life’s A Great Balancing Act. And will you succeed? Yes! You will, indeed! (98 and ¾ percent guaranteed) Kid, you’ll move mountains.
author: Unknown

quote: Only you can control your future.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s not about what it is, it’s about what it can become.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: You’re off to Great Places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, So… get on your way!
author: Unknown

quote: He who makes a beast out of himself gets rid of the pain of being a man
author: Unknown

quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You’re on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who’ll decide where to go…
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t cry because it’s over. Smile because it happened.
author: Unknown

quote: Remember me and smile, for it’s better to forget than to remember me and cry.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s opener there in the wide open air.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: You’ll be on your way up! You’ll be seeing great sights! You’ll join the high fliers who soar to high heights.
author: Unknown

quote: Just tell yourself, Duckie, you’re really quite lucky!
author: Unknown

quote: With your head full of brains and your shoes full of feet, you’re too smart to go down any not-so-good street.
author: Unknown

quote: Congratulations! Today is your day!
author: Unknown

quote: Think! You can think any Think that you wish!
author: Unknown

quote: Take every chance. Drop every fear.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Teeth are always in style.
author: Unknown

quote: You do not like them. So you say. Try them! Try them! And you may!
author: Unknown

quote: And you very small persons will not have to die if you make yourselves heard! So come on, now, and TRY!
author: Unknown

quote: Today was good. Today was fun. Tomorrow is another one.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: If you never did you should. These things are fun and fun is good
author: Unknown

quote: From there to here, from here to there, funny things are everywhere!
author: Unknown

quote: I know it is wet and the sun is not sunny, but we can have lots of good fun that is funny.
author: Unknown

quote: It is fun to have fun but you have to know how.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: When he worked, he really worked. But when he played, he really PLAYED.
author: Unknown

quote: Day Play. We play all day. Night Fight. We fight all night.
author: Unknown

quote: People are weird. When we find someone with weirdness that is compatible with ours, we team up and call it love.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
author: Unknown

quote: I’m glad we had the times together just to laugh and sing a song, seems like we just got started and then before you know it, the times we had together were gone.
author: Unknown

quote: Life’s too short to wake up with regrets. So love the people who treat you right, forgive the ones who don’t and believe that everything happens for a reason. If you get a chance, take it. If it changes your life, let it. Nobody said it’d be easy, they just promised it would be worth it.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: To the world you may be one person; but to one person you may be the world.
author: Unknown

quote: Adults are just obsolete children and the hell with them.
author: Unknown

quote: Adults are just outdated children.
author: Unknown

quote: Children want the same things we want. To laugh, to be challenged, to be entertained, and delighted.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: You make ‘em, I amuse ‘em.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes, when I see my granddaughters make small discoveries of their own, I wish I were a child.
author: Unknown

quote: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You.
author: Unknown

quote: So, open your mouth, lad! For every voice counts!
author: Unknown

quote: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: A person’s a person, no matter how small.
author: Unknown

quote: If you’d never been born, then you might be an Isn’t! An Isn’t has no fun at all. No, he didn’t!
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t give up. I believe in you all.
author: Unknown

quote: You are you. Now, isn’t that pleasant?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I am what I am! That’s a great thing to be! If I say so my self, Happy Birthday to me!
author: Unknown

quote: Be who you are and say what you feel because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I have heard there are troubles of more than one kind. Some come from ahead and some come from behind. But I’ve bought a big bat. I’m all ready you see. Now my troubles are going to have troubles with me!
author: Unknown

quote: It’s a troublesome world. All the people who are in it are troubled with troubles almost every minute. You ought to be thankful, a whole heaping lot, for the places and people you’re lucky you’re not.
author: Unknown

quote: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It’s not.
author: Unknown

quote: If things start happening, don’t worry, don’t stew, just go right along and you’ll start happening too.
author: Unknown

quote: All alone! Whether you like it or not, alone is something you’ll be quite a lot!
author: Unknown

quote: Everything stinks till it’s finished.
author: Unknown

quote: You’re in pretty good shape for the shape you are in.
author: Dr. Suess

quote: I’m sorry to say so but, sadly it’s true that bang-ups and hang-ups can happen to you.
author: Unknown

quote: Things may happen and often do to people as brainy and footsy as you.
author: Unknown

quote: I’m afraid sometimes you’ll play lonely games too, games you can’t win because you’ll play against you.
author: Unknown

quote: When you’re in a Slump, you’re not in for much fun. Un-slumping yourself is not easily done.
author: Unknown

quote: You’re never too old, too wacky, too wild, to pick up a book and read to a child.
author: Unknown

quote: Be awesome! Be a book nut!
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The problem with writing a book in verse is, to be successful, it has to sound like you knocked it off on a rainy Friday afternoon. It has to sound easy. When you can do it, it helps tremendously because it’s a thing that forces kids to read on. You have this unconsummated feeling if you stop.
author: Unknown

quote: ‘The Lorax’ book was intended to be propaganda.
author: Unknown

quote: You can find magic wherever you look. Sit back and relax, all you need is a book.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Preachers in pulpits talked about what a great message is in the book. No matter what you do, somebody always imputes meaning into your books.
author: Unknown

quote: I stay out of politics because if I begin thinking too much about politics, I’ll probably… drop writing children’s books and become a political cartoonist again.
author: Unknown

quote: I am not a consecutive writer.
author: Unknown

quote: Whenever things go a bit sour in a job I’m doing, I always tell myself, ‘You can do better than this.'
author: Unknown

quote: So the writer who breeds more words than he needs, is making a chore for the reader who reads.
author: Unknown

quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you’ll go.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: You have to be a speedy reader because there’s so so much to read.
author: Unknown

quote: You can get help from teachers, but you are going to have to learn a lot by yourself, sitting alone in a room.
author: Unknown

quote: It is better to know how to learn than to know.
author: Unknown

quote: I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: If you keep your eyes open enough, oh, the stuff you will learn. Oh, the most wonderful stuff.
author: Unknown

quote: Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!
author: Unknown

quote: There’s no limit to how much you’ll know, depending how far beyond zebra you go.
author: Unknown

quote: Words and pictures are yin and yang. Married, they produce a progeny more interesting than either parent.
author: Unknown

quote: What it really said to me is how hard the people at our school work, … All of our employees who work here are working hard to do what’s right for our kids.
author: Unknown

quote: I would not like them here or there. I would not like them anywhere. I do not like green eggs and ham. I do not like them Sam I Am.
author: Unknown

quote: Christmas doesn’t come from a store, maybe Christmas perhaps means a little bit more….
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: We looked! Then we saw him. Step in on the mat! We looked! And we saw him! The Cat in the Hat!
author: Unknown

quote: My wonderful weapon, the Jigger-Rock Snatchem, will fling ‘em right back just as quick as we catch ‘em.
author: Unknown

quote: So, on beyond Z! It’s high time you were shown. That you really don’t know. All there is to be known.
author: Unknown

quote: Just go. Go. Go! I don’t care how. You can go by foot. You can go by cow.
author: Unknown

quote: And that is a story that no one can beat, When I say that I saw it on Mulberry Street.
author: Unknown

quote: And turtles, of course… all the turtles are FREE. As turtles and, maybe, ALL creatures should be.
author: Unknown
